title: Champs like Teemo and Ash
body: The only two champs that I can play fairly well is Ash and Teemo. I've tried playing other champs when its free but I suck with them. I bought couple that I liked at first, but I still like Teemo the best. I am pretty new to this game so I don't really know that much about other champs and need help with finding champs like Teemo and Ash. So what other champs are similar to Ash and Teemo that I can learn? Thanks in advance
